message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $15,000. I believe it offers exceptional value at this price point.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your position, Bob, but the product is worth significantly more than that to me.  Could you meet me at $13,500?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $12,250?
